title: Track Fault on East West Line

title_translations.ms: Jejak Kesalahan di Laluan Timur Barat

updates.text: [EWL]UPDATE:Fault cleared, trains are running normally now.
[EWL]UPDATE:Track fault cleared,trains are progressively returning to normal speed.Pls add 10mins travel time from #JooKoon towards#Clementi
[EWL]UPDATE: Pls add 15 mins travel time from #JooKoon towards #Clementi,due to a track fault at #Clementi. Train svc is still available
[EWL]UPDATE:Pls add 20 mins travel time from #JooKoon towards #Clementi, due to a track fault at #Clementi. Train svc is still available
[EWL]UPDATE: Pls add 20 mins travel time from #JooKoon towards #Clementi,due to a track fault at #Clementi. Train svc is still available
[EWL]UPDATE:Pls add 20 mins travel time from #JooKoon towards #Clementi,due to a track fault at #Clementi. Train svc is still available
[EWL]UPDATE:Pls add 15 mins travel time from #JooKoon towards #Clementi,due to a track fault at #Clementi. Train svc is still available
[EWL]: Due to a track fault, pls add 10 mins travel time from #JooKoon to #Clementi towards #PasirRis. Train service is still available.
